<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>We will also load the NCAA tournament result.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">TourneyCompactResults</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">file_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'MNCAATourneyCompactResults'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">TourneyCompactResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TeamID1'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">minimum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">TourneyCompactResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WTeamID'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">TourneyCompactResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'LTeamID'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">TourneyCompactResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TeamID2'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">maximum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">TourneyCompactResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WTeamID'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">TourneyCompactResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'LTeamID'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">TourneyCompactResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'result'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">TourneyCompactResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WTeamID'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="n">TourneyCompactResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TeamID1'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#TourneyCompactResults['ID'] = TourneyCompactResults['Season'].astype(str)+ '_' +TourneyCompactResults['TeamID1'].astype(str)+ '_' +TourneyCompactResults['TeamID2'].astype(str)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Regression---Method-1-&-3">Regression - Method 1 & 3<a class="anchor-link" href="#Regression---Method-1-&-3">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [56]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">team_strength_regression</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">seasons</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.008</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">reg_type</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Lasso'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">home</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">days</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">133</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">zscore</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="sd">"""Find the true team strength by adjusting for opponent and score. Computes the strength based on a single season.</span>
<span class="sd">    For each game we are trying to solve the following equation: team1_loc + team1 - team2 = team1_points - team2_points.</span>
<span class="sd">    Input:</span>
<span class="sd">    data - pandas data frame with same structure as the Kaggle NCAA MRegularSeasonCompactResults or MNCAATourneyDetailedResults</span>
<span class="sd">    files</span>
<span class="sd">    seasons - a list/array of seasons to compute the strength for</span>
<span class="sd">    alpha (default = 0.008) - the regularization parameter</span>
<span class="sd">    reg_type (default = Lasso) - 'Lasso', 'Ridge' or 'Logistic'</span>
<span class="sd">    home (default = False) - if True includes a global home court advanatge variable in the regression</span>
<span class="sd">    days (default = 133) - only includes games with DayNum < days. </span>
<span class="sd">    zscore (default = False) - if True computes the zscore for each season</span>
<span class="sd">    Example:</span>
<span class="sd">    team_strength = team_strength_regression(SeasonResults,np.arange(1985,2020),alpha=0.01,reg_type='Lasso')</span>
<span class="sd">    """</span>
    <span class="n">df_list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">seasons</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="c1"># get a single season at a time</span>
        <span class="n">SingleSeason</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="n">s</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'DayNum'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><=</span><span class="n">days</span><span class="p">)]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
        <span class="c1"># TeamID1 is always the team with the smaller team ID</span>
        <span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TeamID1'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">minimum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WTeamID'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'LTeamID'</span><span class="p">])</span>
        <span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TeamID2'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">maximum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WTeamID'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'LTeamID'</span><span class="p">])</span>
        <span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Score'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WTeamID'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TeamID1'</span><span class="p">],</span>
                                         <span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WScore'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'LScore'</span><span class="p">],</span>
                                         <span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'LScore'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WScore'</span><span class="p">])</span>
        <span class="c1"># maps location to number</span>
        <span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'LocN'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WLoc'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s1">'H'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'A'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'N'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">})</span>
        <span class="c1"># home court for variable team 1 (1 for home, -1 for away and 0 if neutral)</span>
        <span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Loc1'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WTeamID'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TeamID1'</span><span class="p">],</span>
                                         <span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'LocN'</span><span class="p">],</span>
                                         <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'LocN'</span><span class="p">])</span>
        
        <span class="c1"># find all of the unique teams</span>
        <span class="n">unique_teams</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">concat</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TeamID1'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TeamID2'</span><span class="p">]],</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">unique</span><span class="p">()</span>
        
        <span class="c1"># intialize the A matrix</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">home</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">A</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">),</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">unique_teams</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">))</span>
            <span class="n">A</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Loc1'</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">A</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">),</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">unique_teams</span><span class="p">)))</span>
        
        <span class="c1"># create a teamID and team index dictionary</span>
        <span class="n">team_dict</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">zip</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">unique_teams</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">arange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">unique_teams</span><span class="p">))))</span>
        <span class="c1"># runs a loop for each game and encodes the matrix A</span>
        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">ii</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">idx</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">enumerate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">zip</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TeamID1'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">team_dict</span><span class="p">),</span><span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TeamID2'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">team_dict</span><span class="p">))):</span>
            <span class="n">A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">ii</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
            <span class="n">A</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">ii</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span>
            
        <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">SingleSeason</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Score'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span>
     
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">reg_type</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Lasso'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">lin</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Lasso</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="p">);</span>
        <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">reg_type</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Ridge'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">lin</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Ridge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="p">);</span>
        <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">reg_type</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Logistic'</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">lin</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">LogisticRegression</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">C</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">fit_intercept</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">solver</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'lbfgs'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">max_iter</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">);</span>
            <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'reg_type is not recognized. Using Lasso.'</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">lin</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Lasso</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="p">);</span>
            
        <span class="n">lin</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">A</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">);</span>
        
        <span class="n">team_strength</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">team_dict</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'team_index'</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rename</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s1">'index'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'TeamID'</span><span class="p">},</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'team_index'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
        
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">home</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">reg_type</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Logistic'</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">lin</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">coef_</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ravel</span><span class="p">()[:</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
                <span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'home'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">lin</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">coef_</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ravel</span><span class="p">()[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
            <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">lin</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">coef_</span><span class="p">[:</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
                <span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'home'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">lin</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">coef_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">reg_type</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Logistic'</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">lin</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">coef_</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ravel</span><span class="p">()</span>
            <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
                <span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">lin</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">coef_</span>
        
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">zscore</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">mean_strength</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">()</span>
            <span class="n">std_strength</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">std</span><span class="p">()</span>
            <span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">mean_strength</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">std_strength</span>
            
        <span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">s</span>
        <span class="n">df_list</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">)</span>
        
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">concat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_list</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">ignore_index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Let's try it out. I'll set the regularization to be really low which will be equivalent to Ordinary least squares Linear Regression. I'm also loading the teams data so we can inspect it by name.<br/>
I'm using zscore = True - which computes the zscore for every season.  This will insure that the results are relative to other teams in the same season. The output units in this case are standard deviation above the mean.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [36]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">teams</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">file_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'MTeams'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">usecols</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TeamID'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'TeamName'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">team_strength</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">team_strength_regression</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">SeasonResults</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                         <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">arange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1985</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2020</span><span class="p">),</span>
                                         <span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">1e-6</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                         <span class="n">reg_type</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Ridge'</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                         <span class="n">home</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                         <span class="n">zscore</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">team_strength_with_name</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">teams</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">merge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">on</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'TeamID'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>We can look at the top teams from 1985-2019 season</p>
</div>
</div>

<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [35]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">team_strength_with_name</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">by</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'strength'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">ascending</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">head</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Visualize-Results">Visualize Results<a class="anchor-link" href="#Visualize-Results">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">

</div>
</div>

</pre></div>

<div class="output_area">

<div class="tableauPlaceholder" id="viz1588656250429" style="position: relative"><noscript><a href="#"><img alt=" " src="https://public.tableau.com/static/images/NC/NCAAteamstrength/Dashboard/1_rss.png" style="border: none"/></a></noscript><object class="tableauViz" style="display:none;"><param name="host_url" value="https%3A%2F%2Fpublic.tableau.com%2F"/> <param name="embed_code_version" value="3"/> <param name="site_root" value=""/><param name="name" value="NCAAteamstrength/Dashboard"/><param name="tabs" value="no"/><param name="toolbar" value="yes"/><param name="static_image" value="https://public.tableau.com/static/images/NC/NCAAteamstrength/Dashboard/1.png"/> <param name="animate_transition" value="yes"/><param name="display_static_image" value="yes"/><param name="display_spinner" value="yes"/><param name="display_overlay" value="yes"/><param name="display_count" value="yes"/><param name="filter" value="publish=yes"/></object></div> <script type="text/javascript">                    var divElement = document.getElementById('viz1588656250429');                    var vizElement = divElement.getElementsByTagName('object')[0];                    if ( divElement.offsetWidth > 800 ) { vizElement.style.width='1000px';vizElement.style.height='827px';} else if ( divElement.offsetWidth > 500 ) { vizElement.style.width='1000px';vizElement.style.height='827px';} else { vizElement.style.width='100%';vizElement.style.height='727px';}                     var scriptElement = document.createElement('script');                    scriptElement.src = 'https://public.tableau.com/javascripts/api/viz_v1.js';                    vizElement.parentNode.insertBefore(scriptElement, vizElement);                </script>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Cross-Validation">Cross-Validation<a class="anchor-link" href="#Cross-Validation">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Im going to try and find the best regularization parameter. The method I'm choosing is to calculate the team strength for different parameters and then run logistic regression on the strength difference between the teams to predict the NCAA tournament results.<br/>
I'm going to test it for a few seasons by training the logistic regression on all the seasons before the season at question and then testing the log loss score for that season. This is similar to <a href="https://scikit-learn.org/stable/modules/generated/sklearn.model_selection.TimeSeriesSplit.html">Time-Series Cross-Validation</a>.</p>
<p>For example:</p>
<ul>
<li>train for all the seasons between 1985 and 2013 and predict 2014 </li>
<li>train for all the seasons between 1985 and 2014 and predict 2015</li>
<li>etc.</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>I'm going to create a function to hypertune the model</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [76]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">hypertune_model</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">reg_type</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">alphas</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">homes</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">zscores</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="c1"># Define predictive model for the trounament with low regularization parameter </span>
    <span class="n">lr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">LogisticRegression</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">solver</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'lbfgs'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">C</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1000000</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">random_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">max_iter</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1500</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="n">all_scores</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">zscore</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">zscores</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">home</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">homes</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">alphas</span><span class="p">:</span>  
                <span class="c1"># get team strength</span>
                <span class="n">team_strength</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">team_strength_regression</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">SeasonResults</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                                         <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">arange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1985</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2020</span><span class="p">),</span>
                                                         <span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                                         <span class="n">reg_type</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">reg_type</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                                         <span class="n">home</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">home</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                                         <span class="n">zscore</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">zscore</span><span class="p">)</span>

                <span class="c1"># join to tournament data</span>
                <span class="n">TourneyResults</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">TourneyCompactResults</span>
                                         <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">merge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">left_on</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'TeamID1'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">right_on</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'TeamID'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">how</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'left'</span><span class="p">)</span>
                                         <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'TeamID'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
                                         <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">merge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">left_on</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'TeamID2'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">right_on</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'TeamID'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">how</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'left'</span><span class="p">)</span>
                                         <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'TeamID'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
                                        <span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>

                <span class="n">TourneyResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength_diff'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">TourneyResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength_x'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">TourneyResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength_y'</span><span class="p">]</span>

                <span class="n">cols</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength_diff'</span><span class="p">]</span>

                <span class="c1"># define model variables</span>
                <span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">TourneyResults</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="n">cols</span><span class="p">]</span>
                <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">TourneyResults</span><span class="p">[[</span><span class="s1">'result'</span><span class="p">]]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ravel</span><span class="p">()</span>

                <span class="c1"># run cross validation</span>
                <span class="n">scores</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">))</span>
                <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">ii</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">s</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">enumerate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2014</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2019</span><span class="p">)):</span>
                    <span class="n">idxTrain</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">TourneyResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="n">s</span><span class="p">)</span> 
                    <span class="n">idxTest</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">TourneyResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">s</span><span class="p">)</span>
                    <span class="c1"># fit all models</span>
                    <span class="n">lr</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idxTrain</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idxTrain</span><span class="p">])</span>

                    <span class="n">ypred_lr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">lr</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict_proba</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idxTest</span><span class="p">])</span>

                    <span class="n">scores</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">ii</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">log_loss</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idxTest</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">ypred_lr</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>

                <span class="n">all_scores</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">zscore</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">home</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">alpha</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">scores</span><span class="p">),</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">std</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">scores</span><span class="p">)])</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">all_scores</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'zscore'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'home'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'alpha'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'log_loss_mean'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'log_loss_std'</span><span class="p">])</span>   
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Ridge-Regression">Ridge Regression<a class="anchor-link" href="#Ridge-Regression">¶</a></h3><p>I'm going to try a grid search on a few parameters to see which ones yields the best results on the test data</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [62]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">all_scores_df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">hypertune_model</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Ridge'</span><span class="p">,[</span><span class="mf">0.001</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.01</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">],[</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">],[</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [63]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># use this to highlight the minimum value - https://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/user_guide/style.html</span>
<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">highlight_min</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">s</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="sd">'''</span>
<span class="sd">    highlight the maximum in a Series yellow.</span>
<span class="sd">    '''</span>
    <span class="n">is_min</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">min</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'background-color: yellow'</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">v</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="s1">''</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">v</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">is_min</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [64]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">all_scores_df</span>
<span class="n">all_scores_df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">style</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">apply</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">highlight_min</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">subset</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'log_loss_mean'</span><span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[64]:</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>This method is not as good. Not surprising given the fact that we reduced the game result to a binary variable on purpose.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Compare-to-other-ranking-methods">Compare to other ranking methods<a class="anchor-link" href="#Compare-to-other-ranking-methods">¶</a></h1><p>Let's see how many tournament games it predicts correctly if we choose the higher rank team to win.</p>
<p>I'm going to call my ranking method <strong>SHAr</strong></p>
<p>Note: the regression methods I hypertunned used the data we are checking which gives an unfair advantage. An apple to apples comparison would be to tune the regression on earlier data and test all the methods on the last few years. The disadvantage of that method is that there is much less data to compare outcomes.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [79]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ranking</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">file_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'MMasseyOrdinals'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">rank_methods</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'COL'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'DOL'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'MOR'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'POM'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'RTH'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'SAG'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'WLK'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'WOL'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">team_rank</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ranking</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">ranking</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'RankingDayNum'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">==</span><span class="mi">133</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">&</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ranking</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SystemName'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">isin</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rank_methods</span><span class="p">))]</span>
             <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">groupby</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'TeamID'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'SystemName'</span><span class="p">])[</span><span class="s1">'OrdinalRank'</span><span class="p">]</span>
             <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">()</span>
             <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">unstack</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>

            <span class="p">)</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># TourneyCompactResults = pd.read_csv(file_dict['MNCAATourneyCompactResults'])</span>

<span class="n">team_strength</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">team_strength_regression</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">SeasonResults</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                         <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">arange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1985</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2020</span><span class="p">),</span>
                                         <span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.008</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                         <span class="n">reg_type</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Lasso'</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                         <span class="n">home</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                         <span class="n">zscore</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">team_rank</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">merge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">team_strength</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">on</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'TeamID'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">how</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'left'</span><span class="p">)</span>
    

<span class="n">TourneyResults</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">TourneyCompactResults</span>
                         <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">merge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">left_on</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'WTeamID'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">right_on</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'TeamID'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">how</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'left'</span><span class="p">)</span>
                         <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'TeamID'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
                         <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">merge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">left_on</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'LTeamID'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">right_on</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'TeamID'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">how</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'left'</span><span class="p">)</span>
                         <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'TeamID'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
                        <span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">rdata</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">TourneyResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">TourneyResults</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="mi">2002</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'POMr'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'POM_y'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'POM_x'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SAGr'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SAG_y'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SAG_x'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'COLr'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'COL_y'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'COL_x'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'DOLr'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'DOL_y'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'DOL_x'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'MORr'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'MOR_y'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'MOR_x'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'RTHr'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'RTH_y'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'RTH_x'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WLKr'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WLK_y'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WLK_x'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WOLr'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WOL_y'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'WOL_x'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SHAr'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength_x'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">></span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'strength_y'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">g</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">rdata</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">groupby</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">)[[</span><span class="s1">'POMr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'SAGr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'COLr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'DOLr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'MORr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'RTHr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'WLKr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'WOLr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'SHAr'</span><span class="p">]]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">rank_summary</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">g</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">(),</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'PCT_CORRECT'</span><span class="p">])</span>

</div><div class="inner_cell">

<p>Method by Tournament round</p>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [87]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># use this to highlight the minimum value - https://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/user_guide/style.html</span>
<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">highlight_max</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">s</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="sd">'''</span>
<span class="sd">    highlight the maximum in a Series yellow.</span>
<span class="sd">    '''</span>
    <span class="n">is_max</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">max</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'background-color: yellow'</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">v</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="s1">''</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">v</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">is_max</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">round_dict</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="mi">136</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'1: 1st'</span><span class="p">,</span>
              <span class="mi">137</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'1: 1st'</span><span class="p">,</span>
              <span class="mi">138</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'2: 2nd'</span><span class="p">,</span>
              <span class="mi">139</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'2: 2nd'</span><span class="p">,</span>
              <span class="mi">143</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'3: S16'</span><span class="p">,</span>
              <span class="mi">144</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'3: S16'</span><span class="p">,</span>
              <span class="mi">145</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'4: E8'</span><span class="p">,</span>
              <span class="mi">146</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'4: E8'</span><span class="p">,</span>
              <span class="mi">152</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'5: F4'</span><span class="p">,</span>
              <span class="mi">154</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'6: CG'</span><span class="p">}</span>

<span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Round'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'DayNum'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">round_dict</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">round_agg</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Season'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o"><=</span><span class="mi">2019</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">&</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rdata</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'DayNum'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">>=</span><span class="mi">136</span><span class="p">)]</span>
             <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">groupby</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Round'</span><span class="p">)[[</span><span class="s1">'POMr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'SAGr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'COLr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'DOLr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'MORr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'RTHr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'WLKr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'WOLr'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'SHAr'</span><span class="p">]]</span>
             <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">()</span>
            <span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">round_agg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">style</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">apply</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">highlight_max</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Is my ranking method better at predicting the NCAA tournament compared to other ranking methods?<br/>
It is hard to tell because I tunned the regularization parameter on the same data that we are predicting. So I'm probably overfitting the data. If this results hold up over the next few years without modifying the regression parameters then maybe I can claim that.</p>
</div>

entry.title: Shooting vs Game Time
entry.summary: Plotting shooting % as a function of game time

div.output_wrapper {
  /* this position must be relative to enable descendents to be absolute within it */
  position: relative;
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-align: stretch;
  display: -moz-box;
  -moz-box-orient: vertical;
  -moz-box-align: stretch;
  display: box;
  box-orient: vertical;
  box-align: stretch;
  /* Modern browsers */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: stretch;
  z-index: 1;
}
/* class for the output area when it should be height-limited */
div.output_scroll {
  /* ideally, this would be max-height, but FF barfs all over that */
  height: 24em;
  /* FF needs this *and the wrapper* to specify full width, or it will shrinkwrap */
  width: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  border-radius: 2px;
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  display: block;
}
/* output div while it is collapsed */
div.output_collapsed {
  margin: 0px;
  padding: 0px;

}

}
div.out_prompt_overlay:hover {

  box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #000;

}

}
/* This class is the outer container of all output sections. */

  border: 0;

/* This class is for the output subarea inside the output_area and after
   the prompt div. */
div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: auto;
  padding: 0.4em;
  /* Old browsers */
  -webkit-box-flex: 1;
  -moz-box-flex: 1;
  box-flex: 1;
  /* Modern browsers */
  flex: 1;
  max-width: calc(100% - 14ex);
}
div.output_scroll div.output_subarea {

}
/* The rest of the output_* classes are for special styling of the different
   output types */
/* all text output has this class: */
div.output_text {

  color: #000;
  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* stdout/stderr are 'text' as well as 'stream', but execute_result/error are *not* streams */

</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="3-Point-Shooting-%-as-a-Function-of-Time">3-Point Shooting % as a Function of Time<a class="anchor-link" href="#3-Point-Shooting-%-as-a-Function-of-Time">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">nba_api.stats.endpoints</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">shotchartdetail</span>

<span class="o">%</span><span class="k">matplotlib</span> inline
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>I installed an package called nba_api (<a href="https://github.com/swar/nba_api">https://github.com/swar/nba_api</a>) in order to get the data from the NBA api.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Define-functions:">Define functions:<a class="anchor-link" href="#Define-functions:">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">seasons_string</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">start_year</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">end_year</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="sd">'''</span>
<span class="sd">    creates a list of NBA seasons from start-end</span>
<span class="sd">    '''</span>
    <span class="n">years</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">arange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">start_year</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">end_year</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">seasons</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">year</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">years</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">string1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">year</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">string2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">year</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">season</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'</span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="s1">-</span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">string1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">string2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:])</span>
        <span class="n">seasons</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">season</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">seasons</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Get-Data:">Get Data:<a class="anchor-link" href="#Get-Data:">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>I'm running a loop to get shot chart data from multiple seasons</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">season</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">seasons_string</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2013</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2019</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">shotdata</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">shotchartdetail</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ShotChartDetail</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">team_id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'0'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">player_id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'0'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">season_nullable</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">season</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                               <span class="n">context_measure_simple</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'FGM'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">timeout</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">60</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">single_season</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">shotdata</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_data_frames</span><span class="p">()[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">single_season</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SEASON'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">season</span>
    <span class="n">data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">single_season</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">season</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">concat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">ignore_index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>2013-14
2014-15
2015-16
2016-17
2017-18
2018-19
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Data-Analysis:">Data Analysis:<a class="anchor-link" href="#Data-Analysis:">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [4]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">get_time_seconds</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">g</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="sd">""" Use shotcart dataframe columns to get time in seconds """</span>
    <span class="n">period</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">g</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'PERIOD'</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">min_remaining</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">g</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'MINUTES_REMAINING'</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">sec_remaining</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">g</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'SECONDS_REMAINING'</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">where</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">period</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">period</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">12</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">60</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">min_remaining</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">60</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">sec_remaining</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">12</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">60</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">period</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">60</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">min_remaining</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">60</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">sec_remaining</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>I'm going to create time buckets so we can run the analysis per time bucket. First we convert the the time from the data to seconds. This is done with the get_time_seconds function I created. Then, I will use pandas.cut to create time bins in 24 seconds intervals. The intervals are created with numpy.arange.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TIME'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">get_time_seconds</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># works much faster</span>
<span class="c1">#data['TIME'] = data.apply(get_time_seconds,axis=1)</span>

<span class="c1"># Create time buckets to use for aggregation</span>
<span class="n">data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TIME_BUCKET'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">time_bins</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">cut</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'TIME'</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="n">bins</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">arange</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">60</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">48</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">24</span><span class="p">),</span><span class="n">retbins</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>I'm going to group by the time buckets that I created and the shot zone range which will allow us to sepearate the shots based on the shooting range. We care about the shooting % and the frequency of the shots so we can look at the shot made flag and aggregate based on mean and size (to get the average shooting % and the total shots respectively). 
The unstack is very usefull because it converts an index to a column (it pivots the table). In this case we are pivoting the 2nd index which is shot zone range and converting it to columns.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">### Apply aggregation</span>
<span class="n">time_summary</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">groupby</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'TIME_BUCKET'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'SHOT_ZONE_RANGE'</span><span class="p">])[</span><span class="s1">'SHOT_MADE_FLAG'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">agg</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'mean'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'size'</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">unstack</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># create a new column with the sum of all shots</span>
<span class="n">time_summary</span><span class="p">[(</span><span class="s1">'size'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'all'</span><span class="p">)]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">time_summary</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[:,</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">:]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">time_summary</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">head</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[6]:</div>
<div class="output_html rendered_html output_subarea output_execute_result">
